page.title: 17TOURISM __ continued.
page.content: Cheshire.The greatest spread of visitors came from Cheshire and the surrounding counties,two counties were represented in Scotland but none in Ireland.People came from USA, Canada, Africa,Switzerland,Australia and two parties from New Zealand.{ {Age groups _}Most people were between the ages of 20 and 60.{ {Length of visit _}Varied from 15 minutes to 2 days,the majority stayed 1 hour.The average time was 2 hours 44.5 minutes. On Thursday 27th June,between 10.00 and 12.00 am.the 17 canal cruisers passing through Church Lock were given a questionnaire.{ {Craft _}varied in length from 35 _ 70 feet and in size from 2 _ 12 berths. The most common being the middle range 5,6 and 8 berths.Eleven companies were represented(Black Prince owning most).
